verses.text: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* four \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sixth \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* second \w year|strong="H7637"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Darius \w the|strong="H0559"\w* king, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w began|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* seventh month, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aggeus \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

Speak \w to|strong="H0369"\w* Zorobabel \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Salathiel \w the|strong="H0853"\w* governor \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* Jesus \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Josedec \w the|strong="H0853"\w* high priest, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rest|strong="H7604"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w*, saying:

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* left \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H0854"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* house \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* first glory? \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* see \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*? \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* comparison \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes?

Yet \w now|strong="H4714"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w courage|strong="H7307"\w*, O Zorobabel, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w courage|strong="H7307"\w*, O Jesus \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Josedec \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w high|strong="H8432"\w* priest, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w courage|strong="H7307"\w*, \w all|strong="H1697"\w* ye \w people|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H1697"\w* hosts: \w and|strong="H4714"\w* perform (\w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H1697"\w* hosts)

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* covenanted \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H0559"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Egypt: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* spirit \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: fear \w not|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w thus|strong="H2088"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* little \w while|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* move \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dry land.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* move all nations: \w AND|strong="H3068"\w* \w THE|strong="H5002"\w* DESIRED \w OF|strong="H3068"\w* ALL NATIONS \w SHALL|strong="H3068"\w* \w COME|strong="H6635"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* fill \w this|strong="H3068"\w* house \w with|strong="H3068"\w* glory: saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* silver \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w mine|strong="H4480"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* gold \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w mine|strong="H4480"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

Great \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* last house more than \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* first, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* peace, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* four \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twentieth day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ninth month, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* second year \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Darius \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Aggeus \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3808"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0376"\w* hosts: \w Ask|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* carry sanctified flesh \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* skirt \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* garment, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* skirt, bread, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* pottage, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* wine, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* oil, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* meat: \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* sanctified? \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w No|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Aggeus \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w occasion|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* soul touch \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Aggeus answered, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* people, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* nation \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* face, saith \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w work|strong="H7760"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hands: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w there|strong="H2088"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* defiled.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* consider \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* hearts, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H0935"\w* day \w and|strong="H0935"\w* upward, \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* stone \w laid|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* stone \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* temple \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* heap \w of|strong="H3068"\w* twenty bushels, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* became ten: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* press, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* press \w out|strong="H0413"\w* fifty vessels, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* became twenty.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* struck \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* blasting wind, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* works \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* mildew \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* hail, \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w none|strong="H4480"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* returned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Set|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* hearts \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* henceforward, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* four \w and|strong="H3117"\w* twentieth \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* ninth month: \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* temple \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w laid|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* lay \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* hearts.

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* seed \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* sprung \w up|strong="H1961"\w*? \w or|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* vine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fig tree, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* pomegranate, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* olive tree \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* flourished? \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bless \w you|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* second time \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Aggeus \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* four \w and|strong="H3063"\w* twentieth day \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* month, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:
Speak \w to|strong="H3381"\w* Zorobabel \w the|strong="H0251"\w* governor \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Juda, saying: I \w will|strong="H1471"\w* move both heaven \w and|strong="H0376"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* overthrow \w the|strong="H5002"\w* throne \w of|strong="H1121"\w* kingdoms, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H5002"\w* strength \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* Gentiles: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* overthrow \w the|strong="H5002"\w* chariot, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* rideth therein: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* horses \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* riders \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H6635"\w* \w down|strong="H7760"\w*, \w every|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sword \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* brother.
In that day, saith the Lord of hosts, I will take thee, O Zorobabel the son of Salathiel, my servant, saith the Lord, and will make thee as a signet, for I have chosen thee, saith the Lord of hosts.
